title: NewsBreak: API Says Oil Inventories Fell by 5.9M Last Week
text:
NewsBreak: API Says Oil Inventories Fell by 5.9M Last Week

Commodities 3 hours ago (Oct 02, 2019 04:57)

© Reuters. Investing.com - stockpiles dropped sharply last week, according to an estimate from the American Petroleum Institute released Tuesday. The API said dropped by 5.9 million for the week ended Sept. 27. Analysts expect that the Energy Information Administration will report a build of 1.57 million barrels when it issues numbers tomorrow morning. The are due at 10:30 AM ET (14:30 GMT). were down 0.2% at $53.97 following the release, after settling down 0.8% today in regular trading.

NewsBreak: API Says Oil Inventories Fell by 5.9M Last Week
